DOC.brief_summary: Filipino Americans low rate colorectal cancer ( CRC ) screening , later stage diagnosis poorer survival relative racial/ethnic group . To address disparity , investigator develop multi-component intervention increase CRC screening determine efficacy randomize trial ( Maxwell , et . al. , 2010 ) . This study aim determine intervention increase CRC screen best integrate within cultural norm exist structure church community base organization ( CBOs ) predominantly Filipino American membership ensure broad dissemination need screen . The investigator provide partner CBOs resource technical assistance , include train community volunteer health advisor , enable promote CRC screening constituent . Using scientifically rigorous research design , investigator compare two dissemination strategy : Basic dissemination consist single kick-off event community health advisor receive print material FOBT kit distribution train conduct educational small-group session ; Organizational dissemination aim integrate CRC screen dissemination organizational practice process sustain end study . The study implement 20 CBOs train 100 community health advisor ( CHAs ) . The impact two dissemination strategy comprehensively assess collect data CBO level , CHAs 1000 Filipino American participant . The investigator compare proportion Filipino American participant obtain CRC screen dissemination strategy , investigator also assess many reach , intervention implement plan , CBOs support screen effort regular activity , CBOs CHAs maintain effort 4 year study . The investigator hypothesize CBOs implement evidence-based strategy promote CRC screening CHAs organizational dissemination arm reach participant screen participant CHAs basic dissemination arm ; organization organizational dissemination arm adopt CRC screening activity maintain good organization basic dissemination arm .
DOC.brief_title: Community Dissemination Evidence-based Colorectal Cancer ( CRC ) Screening Intervention
DOC.criteria: Filipino American 50 75 year age Must diagnose CRC Must adherent USPSTF CRC screen guideline Not Filipino American Younger 50 old 75 year age Have diagnose CRC Adherent USPSTF CRC screen guideline
